info.author: Mike Bayer
info.description:
=========
HAAlchemy
=========

HAAlchemy is a project under development by Mike Bayer, creator of
SQLAlchemy, which will attempt to provide in-application load-balancing
and failover for database clusters.    The key concept is that a single
Engine / connection pool will be able to directly connect to multiple
servers.
info.name: haalchemy
info.summary: Load balancing for SQLAlchemy connection pools
info.html_description: HAAlchemy is a project under development by Mike Bayer, creator of SQLAlchemy, which will attempt to provide in-application load-balancing and failover for database clusters. The key concept is that a single Engine / connection pool will be able to directly connect to multiple servers.
